password.description: default is 'admin', pre-encrypted with a 16 character salt and 86 character SHA-512 hash

data_schema.description: container for Singlewire Informacast announcement service settings

registration_interval.description: the Informacast registration interval in seconds

data_schema.description: container for Session Initiation Protocol settings

registration_interval.description: the interval between (re)registration attmepts for a given registrar in seconds

ip_protocol.description: the IP protocol to use for SIP messages

digest_realm.description: the realm used for Digest Access Authentication
